channel.title: Life on bxcodec

item.title: What I Learn from Working in Small Startup as A Fresh Graduate
item.description: Hey , my name is Iman Syahputra Situmorang, a Fullstack Software Engineer in Bornevia. I just start working for 6 months. A valuable 6 months to learn what is the feel when working in a small Start Up . Well it will be a shocking news, about the closing of bornevia.com. But I will not telling anything about the reason of bornevia’s closing, I’m just telling what I learn from Bornevia when I work over there.
